```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(arsenal)
library(tidyverse)
library(performance)
library(DescTools)
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r results='asis'}
df = read.csv("/Users/timvigers/Dropbox/Work/Viral Shah/ADA 2022/Data_Clean/combined_data.csv")
df$Group = cut(df$HbA1c,c(-Inf,5.7,Inf),labels = c("< 5.7","5.7 - 6.5"),right = F)
df$abs_diff = abs(df$Diff)
df$abs_diff_cat = cut(df$abs_diff,c(seq(0,1,0.1),Inf),right = F)
t = tableby(Group ~ notest(abs_diff_cat,"count"),df)
summary(t)
```

# Hba1c < 5.7

```{r}
t = table(df$abs_diff_cat,df$Group)
non = as.numeric(t[,1])
non_cis = BinomCI(non,sum(non))
kable(non_cis * sum(non),digits = 0)
```

# Hba1c 5.7 - 6.4

```{r}
pre = as.numeric(t[,2])
pre_cis = BinomCI(pre,sum(pre))
kable(pre_cis * sum(pre),digits = 0)
```
